channel.title: Vote4cash multiple links
channel.description: I've added 3 seperate vote.php's. How do I make it so when it checks to see if you voted for the reward it will check all three?

item.title: Vote4cash multiple links
item.dc:creator: @terain133 terain133
item.description:
@terain133 wrote:

No thats not what I mean. Do you know how you type ::claim well the way its set up is you only have to vote for runelocus to get the ingame reward. I want to encourage my players to vote by voting for all three before getting the ingame reward.

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4cash multiple links
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

You have to change the cookies. Say you want it so it will vote on MoparScape, change the cookies to something like this:

mopar_vote_checker

Keep doing that and it will check if you already voted.

Read full topic
